price: Twanayibashyiriyemo ibibabeshaho ndetse n’ibibeshaho ibindi biremwa mwe mudaha amafunguro.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَعَٰيِشَ وَمَن لَّسۡتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِرَٰزِقِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā lakum fīhā maʿāyisha waman lastum lahu birāziqīna
